name: Quicksave
title: Quicksave
author: dandi345
description: This mod adds a quicksave-key (F6 by default) which saves the game to '_autosave-quick<nr>'. By default the number rotates between 1 and 3 similar to the built-in autosave-feature. This can be changed in the Mod settings. It is also possible to set a name there.
